word_mean: 按摩疗法：一门应用神经生理诊断法的学科，认为健康和疾病都是与神经系统机能有关的生命过程
机械、化学或精神因素刺激神经系统是疾病的原因，而恢复及保持健康则有赖于神经系统功能正常。诊断就是要从中鉴定这些有害刺激，而治疗则是用最保守的方法将其除去。又称chiropraxis
以手捏拿患者背部脊中线的推拿方法。

sentence.Network_en: A permanent cure will only be effected by acupuncture, chiropractic or manipulation.
sentence.Network_cn: 只有针灸、脊椎指压治疗或者推拿术才能实现彻底治愈。

sentence.Network_en: Other treatments include surgery , massage , warm compresses , chiropractic, and acupuncture.
sentence.Network_cn: 该疾病能造成犬只疼痛和跛行.

sentence.Network_en: Unfortunately, an alternative version was developed at the Anglo - European Chiropractic College.
sentence.Network_cn: 不幸的是, Anglo-EuropeanChiropractic学院编制了一种替代版本.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from chiro- 'hand' + Greek praktikos 'practical', from prattein 'do'

entry.tran: 按摩(疗法);(尤指)脊柱推拿(疗法)
entry.def: Chiropractic is the treatment of injuries by pressing and moving people's joints, especially the spine.

means.word_mean: 1. a method of treatment that manipulates body structures (especially the spine) to relieve low back pain or even headache or high blood pressure
